AD_BanishedJudge.synopsis: Statue at the Justice puzzle tells the rules.
AD_BanishedJudge.how_to_trigger: Force S_WYR_PaintingShadow1_bbb26d9b-df5a-49a9-b63a-3db13317ba0d out of his rune circle.

AD_BanishedJudge_0.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_WyrmwayAnnouncer
AD_BanishedJudge_0.text: The dishonourable judge was banished, but judgement must still be passed.
